content.text: Match ends, Alavés 3, Recreativo 3.
Second Half ends, Alavés 3, Recreativo 3.
Foul by Juan Antonio Zamora (Recreativo).
Borja Viguera (Alavés) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Attempt missed. Mauro Quiroga (Alavés) header from the centre of the box is close, but misses to the left following a set piece situation.
Substitution, Alavés. Mauro Quiroga replaces Emilio Sánchez.
Carlos Lázaro (Alavés) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

Goal!  Alavés 3, Recreativo 2. Álvaro Antón (Recreativo) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the top left corner. Assisted by Ezequiel.
